## Who are we?

We are the Berlin Experimental Astronautics Research Student Team e.V. a newly founded student association at the Technische Universit√§t Berlin. 
Our club was founded on the 31th of May 2022 with the goal to provide students from all the discplines the opportunity to apply their theoretical knwoledege in practical space related projects.

In addition to the space projects, which you can find under projects [here](https://www.bears-space.de/projects.html), we also do joint activities. 
We attend trade fairs and congresses together. Below you will find a small photo overview of latest joint activities.

      position: absolute;

      width:100%;

  <script>
    const images = document.getElementsByClassName('slideshow-img');
    let index = 0;
    function switch_image(x) {
      return () => {
        images[index].style.display = 'none';
        index = (index + x + images.length) % images.length;
        images[index].style.display = 'block';
      }
    }
    document.getElementById('prevButton').addEventListener('click', switch_image(-1));
    document.getElementById('nextButton').addEventListener('click', switch_image(1));
    switch_image(0)();
  </script>
